title: HELP PLEASE
content:
Hey guys/Gals need a free font close to this? any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015174253im_/http:/typophile.com/files/veggies_5561.jpg)
author: P.I.

comments.content: the font is Berlin Sans. if you have Office, it may already be installed.
THANKS SO MUCH. I have been burning the candle at both ends...I don't think my eyes can look at another font.... My eyeballs also thank you
